title: My Son is Failing School
description:
What can Joy do about her teenage son who is failing despite being bright because he skips school and doesn't turn in his homework? - Dr. Laura: "The most important thing for him to learn now is how to move out and support himself at 18."

Are you willing to let your child fail? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
